indentation.message: ENCODE uses 4 spaces rather than tabs or any other combination of spaces

media-feature-name-disallowed-list.message: Media query should not use max-width as a parameter. This makes it harded to do mobile-first development

selector-class-pattern.message: Class show follow BEM naming convention. For example: block__element--modifier. For more details see- http://getbem.com/naming/

selector-id-pattern.message: Selecting elements by id is discouraged. Nevertheless, if used, it should follow BEM naming convention. For example: block__element--modifier. For more details see- http://getbem.com/naming/
